item.title: New York University: Sep - Dec 2017
item.description: I was fortunate enough to be given the opportunity to spend a semester at the Center for Real Estate Finance Research at NYU’s Stern School of Business as a visiting student under the sponsorship of Prof. Stijn van Nieuwerburgh. NYU Campus The NYU campus is beautiful. The highlight being Washington Square Park which is situated right in the middle of campus. On any given day, there’s a hub of activity - live jazz, frisbee and even (quite frequently actually) marriage proposals.
